message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $15,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.
I understand you're willing to pay $10,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, after all!
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. Based on my budget, I can offer $12,500 for the product.
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting the product, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $13,500, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to offer $13,000 for the product. This is my final offer within my budget.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think that we might be getting close to the end of the negotiation...
